name: Half-Life
deck: Take on the role of Gordon Freeman as he escapes the disastrous aftermath of an experiment gone wrong in the Black Mesa Research Facility.

name: Half-Life 2: Episode Two
deck: The second episodic sequel to Half-Life 2, Half-Life 2: Episode Two follows usual protagonists Gordon Freeman and Alyx Vance on their oft-interrupted journey to White Forest, a resistance base. Rockets and gnomes abound in Valve's latest addition to the series.

name: Half-Life 2: Episode One
deck: In the first chapter of Valve's episodic follow-up to Half-Life 2, you team up with sidekick Alyx Vance and attempt to  escape from City 17 before it's destroyed.

name: Half-Life 2: Episode Three
deck: If this final chapter of the Half-Life 2 saga is ever released, it will continue the adventures of Gordon Freeman as he fights the trans-dimensional armies of the Combine in a valiant effort to end their occupation of Earth once and for all.

name: Half-Life Deathmatch: Source
deck: Deathmatch multiplayer for the original Half-Life, but now in the Source Engine. It consist of trying to kill the other players to win.

name: Half-Life 2
deck: Several years after the Black Mesa disaster, Gordon Freeman awakens from stasis to aid a resistance movement against the Combine, a collective of trans-dimensional aliens that have conquered Earth.

name: Half-Life 2: Deathmatch
deck: Fast multiplayer action set in the Half-Life 2 universe, complete with Half-Life 2's Source-based physics engine and a teamplay option that pits the human resistance versus the Combine forces. Toss a toilet at your friends today!

name: Half-Life: Decay
deck: Featured in the PS2 release of Half-Life, Decay follows a story running parallel to that of Half-Life, Opposing Force and Blue Shift, featuring two of Gordon Freeman's colleagues unseen in other games. Designed for co-op play, the player must switch back and forth between the two characters if playing alone.

name: Half-Life 2: Lost Coast
deck: Lost Coast was initially created as a section in the Highway 17 chapter of Half-Life 2. After being cut from the game it was later released as a tech demo to showcase HDR lighting in the Source engine.

name: Half-Life: Blue Shift
deck: Half-life: Blue Shift is the second expansion to the critically acclaimed Half-Life.  It follows the path of security guard Barney Calhoun after the resonance cascade. The expansion also included a model upgrade pack for all weapons and character models, usable across Half-Life and both PC expansions.

name: Half-Life: Counter-Strike
deck: Originally created as a modification of the original Half-Life, Counter-Strike has since become its own franchise, setting new standards in online team-based shooters, and was at one point the single most-played online game in the world with a huge competitive following.

name: Half-Life: Uplink
deck: Half Life: Uplink was a Half Life demo released in 1999. The level featured in the demo does not actually appear in the full game.

name: Half-Life: Opposing Force
deck: Half-Life Opposing Force is the first expansion to the original Half-Life. It features Adrian Shephard, one of the marines who was sent to kill Gordon Freeman and the other Black Mesa scientists. The events of Opposing Force are mostly concurrent with that of the original Half-Life.

name: Half Life 2: Survivor
deck: An Arcade version of Half Life 2 that was only released in Japan and is missing many plot elements from the PC version.

name: Half Dead
deck: A Sci-Fi puzzle game, where players compete solve deadly traps on a futuristic game show.

name: Half Past Fate
deck: Half Past Fate is an adventure game about three separate relationships.

name: The Animal Half
deck: A visual novel.

name: Half Dead 2
deck: HALF DEAD 2 is a multiplayer sci-fi game that features a futuristic game show. The main purpose of the game is to survive, but in order to do that you must first escape deadly traps and fight with other players by using different types of weapons.

name: Life & Debt: A Real Life Simulator
deck: Life & Debt

name: Streamer's Life
deck: Streamer's Life

name: Dark Half
deck: A grim RPG for the Super Famicom where the player alternates playing the hero and the villain during the final days of the world.

name: CardLife
deck: CardLife is an online crafting and survival game which takes place entirely in a world made out of cardboard. The game is currently in Early Alpha stage of development.

name: LifeAfter
deck: Left After is a mobile survival game that takes place in a post-apocalyptic world infected by viral pathology, developed by NetEase.

name: Harvest Life
deck: Farm life simulation game, where players have to take care of their fields and animals to sell goods to the townspeople, expand their farm and eventually marry and get children.

name: A Gummy's Life
deck: A local coop game that allows up to 8 players to take on the roles of sweet treats that have come to life.

name: Family Life
deck: Family Life is  life simulation game has been developed by Old Town Entertainment. On First and Third person view, a player can control all family characters and live their life in the Pixel Town.

name: Dealer's Life
deck: A funny tycoon game with retro style graphics.

name: The Way of Life
deck: An emotional adventure game in which players experience different life situations from the viewpoints of difference age perspectives.

name: Life Game
deck: A life simulation game from the first person perspective.

name: Corrupt Life
deck: A role-playing game from Control Emotions.

name: Werewolf Life
deck: A 2D platformer.

name: Dragon Half
deck: RPG developed by Microcabin in 1993.

name: The Other Half
deck: Action adventure featuring a demon hunter clearing a demon infestation and a darker human story.

name: Journey of Life
deck: Journey of Life

name: Half-Minute Hero
deck: When the God of Evil sends all the villains in the land a spell that destroys the entire world and only takes thirty seconds to cast, the world is in need of a Hero in a hurry.

name: Half-Inch Heist
deck: Half-Inch Heist is a free-to-play bullethell-style game for iPhone and iPad. It was developed by Mutant Labs, the developers of Moshi Monsters.

name: Life Forge
deck: Life Forge is a Free 2D Online RPG. Take part in this sprawling adventure as you explore a massive world, gather resources to craft gear, engage in PvE and PvP, and buddy up with your friends to conquer end-game bosses! With lovingly made custom art, a variety of fun and engaging features, and the heart and soul of a tight-knight community, Life Forge promises to be a game to remember!

name: Amenity's Life
deck: A visual novel.

name: Tree of Life
deck: An sandbox MMORPG that incorporates survival-like elements into the game.

name: Short Life
deck: Short Life

name: Youtubers Life
deck: Youtubers Life

name: Club Life
deck: A visual novel in which a high school student must choose between two clubs.

name: Life of a Mobster
deck: An interactive novel.

name: The Dark Half
deck: The Dark Half is a point and click story based adventure game based on the Stephen King novel of the same name. It was released in 1992 by Capstone and even though many consider it to be a terrible game, it is highly sought after and considered a cult hit.

name: Fantasy Life
deck: An expanded version of Brownie Brown and Level-5's life-sim/action RPG-hybrid, serving as the game's first international release. New features include online play for 3 players, additional quests, an increased level cap, and others.

name: Battle For Life
deck: Battle For Life is a First Person Shooter being developed by Jayit Inc. The game takes place in 2020.

name: Avakin Life
deck: Avakin Life is a 3D social game for iOS and Android devices.

name: A Plant's Life
deck: A casual plant simulation/management game where players care/prune/water up to five flowering plants.

name: Fantasy Life
deck: A sim-RPG from Level-5 and Brownie Brown that concentrates on everyday life in a fantasy world. NOTE: This is not the version released in the West.

name: Life of Pixel
deck: A retro platformer about a pixel on a journey through the history of game hardware.

name: Tomodachi Life
deck: When a variety of Miis live in an apartment complex on a secluded island, relationships and bizarre situations happen in this comedic life situation game for the Nintendo 3DS.

name: Monster Life
deck: Monster Life is a management game for mobile platforms.

name: Cart Life
deck: A monochrome business/life simulator written and developed by Richard Hofmeier. The game focuses on the lives of street vendors in the western US.

name: The Good Life
deck: A tropical simulation game for Mac and PC.

name: Half-Minute Hero: The Second Coming
deck: The sequel to Marvelous' cult PSP game, Half-Minute Hero 2 features five new modes of thirty-second RPG chaos, plus a level editor.

name: Island Life
deck: Island Life was an island based farm simulation game on Facebook.

name: Sorority Life
deck: Sorority simulation game on the social networking sites MySpace and Facebook.

name: Last Half of Darkness: Tomb of Zojir
Baby Life
deck: Take care of a baby in this simulation game for the DS.

name: Fairly Life
deck: An adult visual novel.

name: Drawn to Life
deck: Drawn To Life is a game that lets you create your character from scratch by drawing them with the DS stylus.

name: Horse Life
deck: A horse riding simulator for Nintendo DS.

name: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
deck: The tie-in game of the film of the same title. Return to Hogwarts to help Harry survive a fraught sixth year in Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince.

name: Hamsterz Life
deck: Ubisoft started the hamster simulation genre with Hamsterz Life for the Nintendo DS. This game is not to be confused with its sequel, Petz Hamsterz Life 2, which Ubisoft released shortly after the success of the original.

name: This Merchant Life
deck: A trading strategy game.

name: 25 to Life
deck: 25 to Life is a third person shooter video game that allows players to play cops and robbers.

name: Super Life (RPG)
deck: Super Life (RPG)

name: Stereo Life
deck: A visual novel.

name: Super Life of Pixel
deck: Updated "super" version of a retro platformer about a pixel on a journey through the history of game hardware.

name: City Life
deck: City Life is a 3D city builder simulation in which the player has to manage a city from a few houses to a metropolis.

name: Last Half of Darkness: Shadows of the Servants
Esports Life Tycoon
deck: Esports Life Tycoon is the management game where players experience the exciting day-to-day of professional esports teams. Train players, work on their chemistry, break fights, resolve unexpected events.

name: Life Is Strange 2
deck: Dontnod returns for a follow-up to 2015's popular, episodic adventure game.

name: Last Half of Darkness
deck: Last Half of Darkness is a remake of WRF's 1989 game with the same name. It's an horror adventure game in which you explore a mansion and it's surroundings.

name: Still Life
deck: Hop in to the shoes of two McPherson's on an investigation that takes place in two different centuries in this sequel to 2003's Post Mortem.

name: Life On The Floating Island
deck: A role-playing game from Team Niimii.

name: Fantasy Life Online
deck: Fantasy Life Online is a sequel to Fantasy Life released on Nintendo 3DS.

name: Last Half of Darkness
deck: The first part of a long running series of point and click adventure games, released as shareware in 1989. Redubbed Last Half of Darkness: Part 1 with the release of sequels throughout the 90s.

name: Life is Feudal: MMO
deck: Live the medieval life on a massively-multiplayer scale in this follow-up to 2015's sandbox survival game.

name: Alice In Sheltered Life
deck: A role-playing game from akadashi no misoshiru.

name: My Life as a Maiden
deck: A visual novel.

name: Dog's Life
deck: A third-person action-adventure game where players don the role of a typical dog as he travels through the rural United States to rescue his love interest from mysterious dogcatchers.

name: Sexual Life with Shikigami
deck: An adventure game from Miuchisofthouse.

name: Moana: Island Life
deck: Build your own island with the help of characters from Moana

name: Life Of Black Tiger
deck: A game about a black tiger.

name: Soccer Life!
deck: Starting as an amateur footballer by training hard and making correct career choices you can gradually become a world famous professional. Apart from the football side of your career you will also be able to manage aspects of your personal life, including friendships and rivalry, dating, marriage and even raising children.

name: Fantasy Life 2
deck: A sequel to the Nintendo 3DS life-sim/RPG this time for mobile platforms with a more straight up sim angle.

name: Hobo: Tough Life
deck: Hobo: Tough Life

name: Second Life
deck: A customizable, open-ended game that functions like a 3D chatroom with avatars and wide open spaces. It's free with an option for a premium subscription for additional content.

name: Japanese School Life
deck: A Japanese VN about an exchange student, Brian who transfers over to Japan for a year in high school to learn about their culture and customs.

name: The Secret Life of Pets: Unleashed
deck: A match-3 game based on the movie.

name: Yakuza 6: The Song of Life
deck: The sixth chapter in the Yakuza series follows Kazuma Kiryu as he tries to unravel the events that lead to Haruka's hospitalization and the parentage of the infant child she has with her.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Half-Shell Heroes
deck: A collection of mini-games based on the toyline for the youngest of Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles fans.

name: Divine Slice of Life
deck: A visual novel developed by AJTilley.

name: Horse Life 4
deck: Horse Life returns on the 3DS

name: Life On Mars?
deck: A game written by Hugo Labrande for the 21st Annual Interactive Fiction Competition.

name: YOLO Life: The Beggining
deck: A minimalist puzzle-platformer with an odd name.

name: 7,62 Hard Life
deck: Fan-made enhanced remake of 7,62 High Calibre.

name: Cube Life: Island Survival
deck: A block building open-world survival game for the Wii U.

name: Reflections of Life: Dark Architect
deck: When a traitor Architect attempts to destroy the Fantastic Worlds, the player must hunt them down and stop them.

name: The Orange Box
deck: The Orange Box is a video game compilation that packages Half-Life 2 (including Episode 1 and Episode 2), Team Fortress 2, and Portal into one.

name: Tokyo School Life
deck: Tokyo School Life is a visual novel game where players control a foreign exchange student visiting Japan.

name: Gat Life: Boyfriend Bar
deck: A gay dating sim for firearm enthusiasts.

name: Life Is Strange
deck: An episodic adventure game based around time manipulation from Remember Me developers DONTNOD.

name: Pneuma: Breath of Life
deck: An Unreal Engine 4 powered first-person puzzler which is designed to force players to think outside the box and explore beyond what they know as reality through the eyes of a god.

name: Last Half of Darkness 3
deck: The final chapter in the original trilogy of Last Half of Darkness, a series of point and click horror adventure games. Part 3 mixes things up a little with the inclusion of a life meter and a new interface.

name: Life Goes On
deck: Life Goes On is a 2D puzzle-platformer where progression sometimes requires sacrifice.

name: Life of Rome
deck: Life of Rome is an MMORPG set during Ancient Rome.

name: InstLife
deck: A text-based life simulator.

name: A Legionary's Life
deck: Become a simple Roman Legionary during the second Punic War, rise through the ranks, fight the variety of enemies and battle with tough (but fair) RNG.

name: Gacha Life
deck: Gacha life is a game about making 2D characters, getting gacha, and talking to other NPCs in Life mode.

name: Last Life
deck: LAST LIFE is a sci-fi noir adventure game about a transhumanist colony on Mars.

name: DJ Life
deck: Rhythm game for the Nintendo DS by Gamelife in which the player plays the role of a rookie DJ who intends to become the best around.

name: Life of George
deck: An iOS game that has the player(s) creating Lego sculptures and uses the camera to judge the sculptures.

name: Life Quest
deck: Simulation and time management game developed by Big Fish Games.

name: Life Lessons
deck: Life Lessons is a game about a fetus trapped in a simulation by an AI. The AI tries to teach the fetus lessons about life, but its primitive design leads to the lessons being taught in an overly literal manner. The game consists of 30 "lessons", where each lesson is a new level in the game designed around a particular phrase (i.e. "Every dog has his day", "A picture is worth a thousand words", "Laughter is the best medicine", etc). Life Lessons was released for PC and Mac on May 10th, 2018.

name: [redacted] Life
deck: [redacted] Life is a free visual novel developed by Jasmine Osler.

name: Amaranthine Voyage: The Tree of Life
deck: A hidden object puzzle adventure game.

name: Life is Magic
deck: Life is Magic is a free-to-play, GPS location based, fantasy MMORPG.

name: Duck Life
deck: Duck Life is a browser based game where players work to raise ducks.

name: The Good Life
deck: Naomi, a photographer from New York, finds herself in a rural English town where, at night, all the residents turn into cats.

name: Farming Life
deck: Farming simulation game by Pyramid Games.

name: Farm for your Life
deck: A farming/zombie simulator. Fight for your right to farm

name: The Game of Life
deck: The classic board game has come to PC and PS1 in the 3D adaptation.  It also adds some mini-games to accompany some of the spaces you land on.

name: The Sims 3: University Life
deck: A college-focused expansion for The Sims 3.

name: A Bug's Life
deck: A Bug's Life is a platformer aimed at young children based on the Pixar movie of the same name.

name: Girls' RPG: Cinderella Life
deck: Girls' RPG: Cinderella Life is an RPG developed specifically for a female market by Level-5 where the player assumes the role of a hostess in a castle.

name: AquaLife
deck: AquaLife is a strategy game for the Game Boy Color.

name: Zoobles! Spring to Life!
deck: Activision's Nintendo DS release comes with an exclusive Zooble. Zoobles!

name: Active Life: Magical Carnival
deck: An entry in the Active Life Wii series set in an amusement park, featuring haunted houses, pirate ships and colorful parades.

name: Drawn to Life Collection
deck: Two Drawn to Life titles on one card.

name: Horse Life Adventures
deck: Horse Life Adventures is the third game in the Horse Life series.

name: Active Life Explorer
deck: Active Life Explorer is an adventure game that has players searching for treasure all over the world.

name: Half-Minute Hero: Super Mega Neo Climax
deck: Half-Minute Hero: Super Mega Neo Climax is a port of the PSP RPG/puzzle game mashup Half-Minute Hero, released on XBLA and PC. It also includes a new graphical style and an added multiplayer component.

name: Dating Life: Miley X Emily
deck: A yuri themed visual novel from Dharker Studio.

name: Like Life Every Hour
deck: Like Life Every Hour is a Japanese PSP game.

name: Still Life 2
deck: The sequel to the critically acclaimed Still Life, Still Life 2 picks up the story of Victoria McPherson 3 years later, investigating a new series of murders in Maine.

name: Fight for Life
deck: The Jaguar's answer to Virtua Fighter and Tekken, pitting eight dead generic warriors in a Hellish tournament for a chance at another life. It is the last first-party game for the system.

name: Drawn to Life: The Next Chapter
deck: The Sequel To the original Drawn To Life. The sequel is much like the original but it gives you more freedom on how your make your hero and objects.

name: Active Life: Extreme Challenge
deck: Active Life: Extreme Challenge

name: Animal Planet: Vet Life
deck: Veterinarian simulation featuring 40 animal species to care for.

name: Last Half of Darkness: Beyond the Spirit's Eye
Horse Life 2
deck: DS game that allows the player to go on adventures around the world on horseback.

name: Last Half of Darkness II
deck: Last Half of Darkness II is an point and click horror adventure game. It's the direct sequel to Last Half of Darkness, starting off at the point where the first game ended.

name: Active Life: Outdoor Challenge
deck: This outdoor focused mini-game collection for the Wii features a DDR style "mat controller".

name: The Sims 2: Apartment Life
deck: The eighth expansion pack in The Sims 2 series brings the ability to live in apartment buildings along with the introduction of magic.

name: Super Bit Adventure: Paragons of Life
deck: Super Bit Adventure: Paragons of Life

name: Life of D. Duck II
deck: A bizarre satirical adventure game created by Norwegian artist Bjørnar B.

name: City Life 2008
deck: City Life 2008 is the second expansion pack for the game City Life by the French developer Monte Cristo, adding new buildings, scenarios, maps, and an updated editor with the ability to import satellite maps.

name: LifeSigns:  Surgical Unit
deck: A medical-themed adventure game for the DS. It is the sequel to the Japan-only DS launch title Kenshuui Tendo Dokuta, which inspired the more gameplay-heavy Trauma Center series.

name: Long Life
deck: Fighting game developed in Hungary for the Commodore 64.

name: Life Is Strange: Before the Storm
deck: A prequel to the initial Life is Strange game, focused on Chloe's life.

name: Cube Life: Pixel Action Heroes
deck: A  first-person shooter follow-up to Cube Life: Island Survival

name: Life is Feudal: Forest Village
deck: A city building strategy game set in the medieval period with realistic survival aspects.

name: Double Teacher Life
deck: Double Teacher Life (Daburu Sensei Raifu) is a PC adventure game for adults by Alice Soft.

name: Last Half of Darkness: Society of the Serpent Moon
deck: Society of the Serpent Moon is an indie horror adventure game in the long running Last Half of Darkness series. A traditional point and click adventure where the player investigates murders rumored to have been committed by vampires in the European town of Antibes.

name: The Sims: Life Stories
deck: Yet another version of the bestselling game The Sims, which attempts to introduce a different aspect of gameplay by making players complete tasks to further the "life story" of pre-designed Sims.

name: SimLife
deck: SimLife was a genetic diversification simulator from Will Wright and Maxis. Create new life forms, introduce them to a planet's ecosystem, and watch them flourish or become extinct.

name: Life of D. Duck
deck: D. Duck has to make porridge in order to win the Andecity Marathon.

name: Volvo: Drive for Life
deck: An advertising game for Volvo focusing on the safety of the vehicles.

name: Life is Feudal: Your Own
deck: A sandbox game set in the Middle Ages. Players can modify the land as they please and build what they want.

name: Crime Life: Gang Wars
deck: Take control of Tre, a member of a gang called "The Outlawz", who are trying to rise to the top of the criminal underworld.

name: Soccer Life II
deck: This sequel to Soccer Life! once again lets players start a journey as a young professional footballer and become a legend of the game.

name: Hakuoki SSL: Sweet School Life
deck: A reimagining of the Hakuoki series in a modern high school setting.

name: Harvest Moon: A Wonderful Life
deck: Harvest Moon: A Wonderful Life is the first iteration of the popular series to appear on the Nintendo Gamecube. It was later released for the PlayStation 2 as well.

name: The Sims 3: Town Life Stuff
deck: The Sims 3: Town Life Stuff is the 4th item pack for The Sims 3. It features new locations for your Sims to visit such as a Laundromat and a Ultramodern Library.

name: Life & Death
deck: A surgery simulation game that allowed players to operate on virtual patients.

name: Nat Geo Quiz! Wild Life
deck: Quiz about on wildlife using National Geographic content.

name: Conway's Game of Life
deck: A "zero-player game" simulation of cell division created by John Conway circa 1970.

name: Life Force
deck: Life Force is the US title for the Japanese video game Salamander. Though similar to Gradius, Life Force does have some unique modifications to differentiate it from its more well-known predecessor.

name: Virtual Villagers 4: The Tree of Life
deck: Virtual Villagers 4: The Tree of Life is the fourth entry in the Virtual Villagers strategy game series.

name: Chronicles of Mystery: The Secret Tree of Life
deck: Help Sylvie Leroux, a young archaeologist, discover the secrets of the legendary Tree of Life, which is said harbors the power of immortality.

name: Miami Nights: Life in the Spotlight
deck: Miami Nights: Life in the Spotlight for DsiWare

name: One Single Life
deck: One Single Life is an iOS game in which the player must time jumps between buildings. The player can practice the jump with no penalty, but falling to your death on the real thing means you can no longer play the game.

name: One Hour One Life
deck:
A multiplayer survival game of parenting
and civilization building by Jason Rohrer.

name: Toca Life: Town
deck: A sort of mini game collection ideal for kids growth

name: Kept Man Life
deck: A mobile clicker game in which the goal is to avoid working and maintain a kept man lifestyle while simultaneously making the girlfriend happy by doing household chores.

name: Toca Life: World
deck: Play with characters and objects, discover secrets, and act out stories.

name: A Topsy Turvy Life: Turvy Drops
Girls Life: Beauty Experience
deck: no info

name: Girls Life : Strass & Diamonds
deck: no info

name: Life Quest 2: Metropoville
deck: Life Quest 2: Metropoville is a game developed by Big Fish Games. It has simulation, time management and strategy elements.

name: Life Forge ORPG
deck: Life Forge ORPG

name: Risk Your Life
deck: An obscure Malaysian MMORPG from around 2005, that still has a cult following.

name: Emergency Room: Real Life Rescues
deck: Solve 30 medical cases with mini games.

name: Kingpin: Life of Crime
deck: Known for extremely vulgar dialogue and over-the-top violence, the story of Kingpin is one of revenge against the ultimate crime lord the Kingpin.

name: UFO: A Day in the Life
deck: A puzzle adventure game by Love-de-Lic.

name: Prison Life RPG
deck: Android and IOS game.

name: Military Life: Tank Simulator
deck: Military Life: Tank Simulator is a PC game. It realistically depicts the heroic life of a tank operator in a military.

name: Life is Hard
deck: "Life is Hard" is a 2D god simulator.

name: After Life - Story of a Father
deck: After Life is an interactive "walking simulator" from developer Green Sawdust.

name: This Grand Life
deck: This Grand Life

name: Kitty Powers' Love Life
deck: Kitty Powers' Love Life

name: The Aether: Life as a God
Escape from Life Inc
deck: Escape from Life Inc is a story-driven platformer releasing in 2020.

name: Life of Harry
deck: A maze-action game developed by John Hopper and published by Cascade Games for ZX Spectrum.

name: Monty Python's The Meaning of Life
deck: The Meaning of Life is a Monty Python game based on the movie of the same name.

name: Evolution: The Game of Intelligent Life
deck: An educational strategy game published by Discovery Channel.

name: Innocent Life: A Futuristic Harvest Moon
deck: An alternative take on the classic Harvest Moon formula, Innocent life puts the player in control of a robot called Life. Learn to farm and develop human emotions whilst trying to save Heartflame Island. Developed exclusively for PSP.

name: The Sims 2: Glamour Life Stuff
deck: Glamour Life Stuff adds a selection of exotic artwork, high-end electronics, and elegant clothing to The Sims 2.

name: Tomoyo After: It's a Wonderful Life
deck: A spin-off of Clannad which expands on the story of Tomoyo Sakagami, one of the heroines of the original title. Features a strategy RPG mini-game which has its own story.

name: Night Life
deck: One of Koei's first video games, Night Life was an adult computer game released in 1982.

name: World Neverland: Daily Life in the Elnea Kingdom
deck: The fifth game in the Never Wonderland series.

name: If You Live Another Life As Female
deck: A role-playing game from Dod.

name: Singles: Flirt Up Your Life!
deck: SIngles: Flirt up your life is a game in which sad, time-deprived Giant Bomb contributers such as ourselves can experience the wonder of relationships through the magic of a mediocre Sims clone.

name: Harvest Moon: Another Wonderful Life
deck: Harvest Moon: Another Wonderful Life is a modified version of Harvest Moon: A Wonderful Life, featuring a female protagonist.

name: Sid Meier's Pirates!: Live the Life
deck: Remake of the original Sid Meier's pirates, placing you in the role of a pirate searching for his kidnapped family. Battle rival pirates on the high seas and command an ever-growing crew of pirates as you work towards becoming a legendary pirate.

name: Life Simulator of You, a Married Woman Seduced
deck: A role-playing game from WINMAX.

name: Knightess Layla: The Humiliating Life of a Seed Bed
deck: A role-playing game from WINDWAVE.

name: Vaginal Orgasm Girl's Another World Life
deck: A role-playing game from Tsukudaninosato.

name: Josou Gal Bitch Gakuen: Half Musume Judy no Yuuwaku
deck: A visual novel from Gal Prince.

name: The Life Stage: Virtual House
deck: One out of five launch titles for the 3DO. This is a "House" simulator for the 3DO. It was the first 3D simulation/adventure game.

name: How Visual Novels Changed My Life
deck: A group of friends are brainstorming ideas for their next big visual novel. How Visual Novels Changed My Life is a visual novel by Träumendes Mädchen.

name: Rode Kill: A Day in the Life
Life & Death 2: The Brain
deck: Medical simulation game

name: My Riding Stables: Life with Horses
deck: An equestrian stable simulator.

name: Attack of Jeff the Killer: Scary Slender Life
deck: Dodge and shoot the cars of irate locals as the legendary creepypasta character.

name: Emergency Room: Life or Death
deck: The fourth game in the Emergency Room doctor simulation series.

name: Species: Artificial Life, Real Evolution
deck: Species: Artificial Life, Real Evolution is an evolution simulation with hands on interaction. It allows for direct changes to each creature as well as indirect and gradual environmental changes which affect the species and their evolution.

name: PetWorld - WildLife America
deck: A simulation management game where the player takes care of wounded wild animals

name: Hidden Object: Cat Sweet Life
deck: A hidden object game.

name: Hidden Object: Dog Happy Life
deck: A hidden object game.

name: Hidden Object: Tree of Life - Yggdrasil
deck: A hidden object game.

name: Athena: Awakening from the Ordinary Life
deck: A survival-horror adventure RPG detailing the origins of Athena Asamiya, a character from The King of Fighters. The game is much darker than anything else featuring Athena.

name: Loving Life with Hello Kitty & Friends
deck: A handheld mini-game collection for the DS featuring Hello Kitty and her Sanrio companions.

name: Life in the Fast Lane
deck: A DOS implementation of Conway's Game of Life.

name: The Life of a Pacifist is Often Fraught With Conflict
deck: A short visual novel created by Bento Smile, centered around a game development studio. Like many of Bento Smile's games, this utilizes the Ren'Py engine.

name: Charm Girls Club: My Charmed Life
deck: The first iPhone release in the Charm Girls Club Franchise.  Players ask the Charm Girls questions in a variety of subjects and receive advice and tips.

name: Pet Pals: New Leash on Life
deck: Veterinary simulation.

name: Drawn to Life: SpongeBob SquarePants Edition
deck: A Drawn to Life game where players control SpongeBob and have to fight of DoodleBob.

name: A Day In the Life
deck: A Day in the Life tasks players with getting Clive Sinclair (of Sinclair Radionics) to his knighting ceremony

name: Mainichi Kedamono!! Love Ero Momoiro School Life
The Suite Life of Zack & Cody: Circle of Spies
deck: Join Zack and Cody on their second adventure on the DS.

name: Shelley Duvall's It's a Bird's Life
deck: An educational game written and narrated by actress Shelley Duvall

name: The Suite Life of Zack & Cody: Tipton Trouble
Big Titty Teacher: Hentai School Life
deck: A visual novel.

name: The Suite Life of Zack & Cody: Tipton Caper
deck: Join Zack and Cody in their adventures at the Tipton Hotel.

name: Aazor: The Life of a Demon - Part I: The Beginning
deck: A point-and-click adventure game.

name: Serf City: Life is Feudal
deck: Serf City: Life is Feudal is a RTS title from blue byte studios. The stand out aspect of the title was its slow, almost peaceful pace. The game featured very little combat and focused on setting up and establishing a thriving settlement.

name: Emergency 2: The Ultimate Fight for Life (Deluxe Edition)
Apartment Life to Cuck and Impregnate Neighboring Busty Married Women
deck: A visual novel from Miel.

name: Idol Mystic Knightess Fyllia: Downfall Life Filled With Humiliation
deck: A role-playing game from Milky Way.

name: 3 Year's of School Life Accepting my Friend's Cum
deck: An adventure game from BABYLON.

name: Erotic RetrLife! Give Me Your Semen Please, My Master!
deck: A role-playing game from QRoss.

name: A Topsy Turvy Life: The Turvys Strike Back
deck: The second Tecmo DSiWare game to feature upside-down gameplay, this time with a space shooter twist!

name: (P)lanets - the life of normalcy has ended!
deck: (P)lanets - the life of normalcy has ended! is a free visual novel developed by TeaCup Production.

name: Monster Musume: Everyday Life with Monster Girls Online
deck: A card collection game based on the Monster Musume universe, gameplay is similar to Kantai Collection.

name: Dandy: Or a Brief Glimpse Into the Life of the Candy Alchemist
deck: Dandy: Or a Brief Glimpse into the Life of the Candy Alchemist is a perma-death side-scrolling shoot 'em up with stacking power-ups. It features procedurally generated maps with reactive enemies that force the player to strategize. The game also features a local co-op mode, and an online racing mode.

name: Oji-san Tomete Iede Gal to no Win Win Sex Life
deck: A visual novel from Solarray.

name: Rocko's Modern Life: Spunky's Dangerous Day
deck: Based on the '90s Nickelodeon cartoon Rocko's Modern Life, players control the anthropomorphic wallaby Rocko as he escorts his fathful (but dim-witted) canine companion to his goal.

name: Final Fantasy Crystal Chronicles: My Life As a Darklord
deck: My Life As a Darklord is a tower defense game set in the Crystal Chronicles continuity of the Final Fantasy universe.

name: Final Fantasy Crystal Chronicles: My Life as a King
deck: Manage your town and send adventurers out on quests in this Final Fantasy-based strategy game. "It's good to be the king"

name: Sunny Shine on the Funny Side of Life
deck: A promotional but still commercial graphic adventure that was commissioned by the cigarette company Phillip Morris(known by the brands Marlboro and L & M) and published by Rainbow Arts for various systems.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: A Day in The Life of a Sponge
deck: A day in the life of Spongebob teaches children (and Adults) core skills such as spelling, maths, geometry and money skills.

name: Pajama Sam: Life is Rough When You Lose Your Stuff
Everyone's A Wally: A Day in the Life of Wally
deck: Everyone's a Wally is a game by Mikro-Gen where the main objective is to get into the bank and withdraw money via solving a series of linked puzzles and collect the letters B-R-E-A-K

name: The Fabulous Wanda and the Secret of Life, the Universe, and Everything
Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku o! In The Life
deck: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku o! In The Life

name: 2000:1: A Space Felony (Or How I Came To Value My Life And Murder Mercilessly)
deck: 2000:1: A Space Felony is a humorous homage to 2001: A Space Odyssey

name: A totally my type Angel came, so I made her an otaku & began an lovey erotic life!
deck: A role-playing game from Mugcat.

name: 38 Man Kilo no Kokuu File 1: A Day in the Life of 2049
deck: A sci-fi adventure game that is the fifth installment in System Sacom's Novel Ware franchise.
